name: The Last Bullet (Is A Magic Bullet)
name_original: The Last Bullet (Is A Magic Bullet)
description:
Battle with Cowboys using your magic revolver and normal long sword.

Every last bullet you fire from your revolver is a random magic bullet.

The game is totally playable, although rough in some aspects.

Clear the levels to win. Carrying less stuff slightly increases your speed.

Made using Godot, for LOWREZJAM 2019!

Controls:

w,a,s,d - move

1, 2 - switch weapon

left click - attack

right lick -  throw

e - pick up

r - restart

back space - quit to menu

* If the bullets act weird try refreshing.  If the game runs slow try closing other stuff. If those doesn't work try downloading the game.
